context: Hi! What movies do you like ?!

Hi. I love animation movies, trying to get ready for Incredibles 2 (2018) so I will be watching The Incredibles (2004) and other animated movies this weekend. Any suggestions? I loved Zootopia Finding Dory (2016)
resp: Ok I see have you seen A Bug's Life (1998)
